meta_description: Western Reserve Historical Society is the oldest cultural institution in Northeast Ohio. It's the home of the Cleveland Historical Center, the Crawford Auto Aviation Museum, and Hale Farm and Village.

accessibility_text:
## WRHS Accessibility Statement

**DRAFTED 2.20.2024**

For Website

Western Reserve Historical Society (WRHS) prioritizes people, place and purpose. For our people, the WRHS community and the communities we serve, WRHS strives for a culture of excellence, diversity, equity, access and inclusion. This commitment extends to the WRHS website and other digital resources for all visitors regardless of ability.

To this end, we aim to comply with best practices and standards as defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101005610/https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20/)

## Feedback

We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of the WRHS website. Please let us know if you encounter any accessibility barriers by contacting us:

  * Phone: [216-721-5722](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101005610/tel:330-454-3426) x1402
  * E-mail: [info@wrhs.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101005610/mailto:info@wrhs.org)
  * Address: [10825](http://web.archive.org/web/20260101005610/https://www.google.com/maps/place/Stark+Community+Foundation/@40.800935,-81.3761739,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x8836d079db21e925:0xbe7f9d8259859207!8m2!3d40.800935!4d-81.3739852) East Boulevard, Cleveland, Ohio 44106

We try to respond to feedback within 3 business days.

Please describe the nature of the difficulty you are experiencing with the page, and be sure to provide the relevant URL as well as an email address or phone number where we ...
collections_text:
## Places to Visit

Explore, experience or research your way through the history of the Western Reserve.  
Your adventure starts here!

### [Cleveland History Center Experience Cleveland like never before through vast and varied collections covering family history, community history, entrepreneurship, and technological innovation, featuring items, documents, and artifacts. ](plan-visit/places-to-visit/cleveland-history-center) ### [Crawford Auto Aviation Museum The Crawford Auto-Aviation Collection brings the history of transportation alive through over 170 antique automobiles, 21 non-car transportation artifacts (motorcycles, bicycles, and boats), 12 aircraft, and 3 carriages and sleighs. ](plan-visit/places-to-visit/crawford-auto-aviation-museum) ### [Library WRHS Library collections include 250,000 books, 25,000 newspapers, numerous maps, sheet music, broadsides, other printed ephemera, unpublished manuscripts, including 340,000 images, and more. ](plan-visit/places-to-visit/library) ### [Hale Farm & Village Hale Farm & Village is a living history museum within Cuyahoga Valley National Park. Explore 19th-century life in the Western Reserve including 32 historic structures, demonstrations, farm animals, and gardens. ](plan-visit/places-to-visit/hale-farm-village)
